snippet: The agency is an apparent attempt to reduce risk and wean the economy off easy credit; it will, among other things, coordinate monetary regulatory policies, information-sharing and statistics.
abstract: Chinese authorities say they will set up group to coordinate financial regulation; new agency is apparent attempt to reduce risk and wean economy off easy credit; will coordinate monetary regulatory policies, information-sharing and statistics.

byline.original: By BETTINA WASSENER and CHRIS BUCKLEY

lead_paragraph: The agency is an apparent attempt to reduce risk and wean the economy off easy credit; it will, among other things, coordinate monetary regulatory policies, information-sharing and statistics.

headline.main: New Chinese Agency to Increase Financial Coordination
